projects.title: Mapping energy controversies on social networks
projects.description:
----A research commissioned by the RESPONSE project team at Delft University of Technology----

The current research contributes to the project by studying the role of modern media in the evolution and development of energy controversies. The main objective of this project is to reflect on controversial energy technologies and develop a methodology which will enrich the overall assessment of decision making by adding public values, concerns and knowledge. 

Abstract:

This research explored the evolution of the controversial debate on nuclear energy on Facebook between 2011-2016 in France, Germany, Netherlands, United Kingdom and Turkey.  Harvesting data via digital techniques from social networks, such as Facebook and Twitter, is an efficient way to detect, analyse, and visualise these controversies.

The network analysis revealed that the majority of the debate on Facebook is carried out by NGOs and bottom-up community pages, while traditional media, governments and political institutions prefer to use websites. Furthermore, the connections between Facebook pages and between those and the World Wide Web were explored. This showed a rather high degree of regionalisation of the debate, where communities tend to connect to web sites and pages from the same country or area. To conclude, the evolution of the network over six years (2011 - 2016) revealed a rather static picture, with however increasing connections between countries and continents. 

The content analysis, on the other hand, allowed for a more specific insight into the topics of interest of different communities, revealing a rather high diversity between the pro and con pages studied: the former discussing about the potential for energy generation and production technologies; while the latter focusing on costs, climate impacts and nuclear disasters. Differences were also found between countries, type of page and level of user engagement.

projects.title: Sustainability and Recycling
projects.description:
Preparation of the "environmental course" for children at the primary school in Kosice (Slovakia). 
The aim of this project was to educate 10-years-old kids and increase their awareness about the necessity to protect our environment.  This training helped to increase recycling rates and activities at the school and promote package-free shopping.

profile_positions.description:
With more than 1 year working experience at Safescan BV., I was in charge of the accomplishments of the following tasks:

★Data entry ★
•manual and web orders registration and processing
•data verification
•payment authorization
•invoicing 
•crediting
•debtor creation/editing
•amending order volumes in regards the stock availability

★Supporting supply chain processes★
•monitoring the outgoing shipments
•handling delivery related claims 
•preparation of credit notes
•calculating shipment volume for pallet deliveries, transit times, quotes for express services 
•arrangements of booking slots

★Supporting customer service★ 
•direct and indirect communication with customers and vendors
•providing order confirmations
•monitoring delays
•issuing re-shipments and refunds

Working at the order desk department, I have excelled and/or improved my skills in:
✔ Accuracy
✔ Orientation on detail
✔ Meeting strict deadlines
✔ Backlog prevention
✔ Working in systems such Exact, Salesforce etc.
✔ Dutch language
profile_positions.title: Order Desk Assistant

profile_positions.description:
As a logistic coordinator with 2 years experience at Gist B.V., I was working in a fast-paced environment responsible for coordinating truck fleet operations primarily in food industry in the  UK, France, the Netherlands and Belgium.

At this position I was performing the following tasks with high precision:

★ Resource planning and efficiency★
• daily tracking and monitoring the trucks and trailers (Tx, Schmitz system)
• thorough planning of trucks with respect to regulation (EC) No 561/2006
• seeking loads/backloads/charters where necessary (e.g. Timocom)
• communicating the breakdowns with workshops and engineers

★ Customers and 3rd parties communication★
• cultivated ongoing network of customer relationships
• provided exceptional service by 95%+ on time delivery
• customer satisfaction by analyzing fleet capacity and providing last minute resource allocation
• reaching and contracting charters and freight partners

★Fleet utilization and profitability★
• dedicated to reduce cost of running empty km
• price negotiation based on calculating new routes
• surpassing weekly budget

★Administration★
• timely delivery of international shipments (ETAs monitoring and alerting under account of      delayed shipments, OTAs reporting)
• bookings of Ferry/Eurotunnel/ warehouse slot deliveries
• processing and verifying detail sensitive paperwork
• order administration including cancellation

By working at this position, I have strengthened the following skills:
✔ Problem solving and multitasking
✔ Work under intense pressure to meet delivery deadlines
✔ Teamwork
✔ Working in systems such as Transpas
✔ Answering emails and calls on a professional level
✔ Understanding operational steps to maximize profitability

company.name: Europarkett Slovakia, s.r.o. Wood floor manufacturing company

profile_positions.company: Europarkett Slovakia, s.r.o. Wood floor manufacturing company
profile_positions.description:
Europarkett Slovakia is a wood floor manufacturing company with the state-of-art production technologies providing high-quality products and services. Working at the head office, I was given the opportunity to demonstrate my talent, grow and excel in many areas. 

I enjoyed to be a part of such dynamic environment where I gained technical knowledge of the entire production processes, supply chains as well as sales strategies and marketing.
 
It was my pleasure to performed multiple tasks at different positions:

★ International Sales Assistant ★
• Customer support and communication
• Orders acceptance, creation and delivery of invoices
• Networking in order to enter the international market
• Organisation of business meetings
• Establishment and maintenance of customer relations
• Day-to-day database operations and updates
• Files revision
• Budgeting 
• Logistics

★ Human Resources Assistant ★
• Maintenance of databases 
• Files update
• Contract preparation
• Documents archivation
• Business travel arrangements
• Secretarial support

★  Marketing Responsible ★
• Promotion on exhibitions (company presentation in front of a big audience)
• Product updates on the website 
• Posters preparation
• Logistics and preparation of promotion packages 

★ Payroll Accounting ★
• Complete administration and communication with various institutions (Insurance companies, state offices etc.)
• Payroll accountancy for over 100 employees

My main accomplishments that I am proud of, include:
✔  Overall growth of the company’s sales 
✔  Establishment of the international sales department and enrichment of customer relations
✔   Assistance in integration of a new system and database programme
✔  Coordinated a launch of a new online shop
profile_positions.title: International Sales Assistant, Payroll Accountant & HR Assistant

volunteer_experiences.description:
As a member of BEST, a student association, I took a part in organising the following events: 
★ Delft University of Technology 
• Spring Course 2015: Member of a core team for organising a seasonal engineering event. I was responsible for organising social activities and ensure daily duties
• Athens Course 2015: Prepared social activities and programs including campus tours 

★Technical University of Košice (Slovakia)
• Engineering competition in 2012. Responsible for participant communication and logistics
• Winter Course 2013. Responsible for day-to-day duties and logistics

★ Universitatea Politehnica din Bucuresti (Romania)
• Co-organized Summer Course in 2013

As a participant, I attended several courses at these technical universities: 
★ Winter Course 2013 at École Supérieure d'Électricité (Paris, France): Networks
★ Autumn Course 2012 at Warsaw University of Technology (Poland): Presentation skills
★ Summer Course 2012 at Middle East Technical University (Ankara, Turkey): Sustainable transportation systems

In 2008, I became a member of Slovak Ferret Breeders Association. Thanks to my dedication and passion in promoting the animal welfare, I started writing articles for magazines and I created my own blog. 

Since 2009, as a passionate volunteer, I was involved in organising international ferret exhibitions in the Czech Republic and Germany.  After gaining experience and appropriate knowledge I have organised multiple shows in Slovakia. 

My main tasks included:
• Logistics
• Translations
• Assistance with jury procedure 
• Reservation and preparation of facilities
• Preparation of documentation and diploma's 
• Administration of registration forms and database creation
• Tasks delegation and effective communication with the core team
